long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a tool to navigate the community easily

How to Use

1. Open a community page to take advantage of the features

2. Please check the URL. If you don't see any parameters related to page, please proceed with page 2.

3. Please open the extension, modify the tile as desired, check the check box, and fill in the parameters checked in the URL.

(If the URL is 
'hello.com/board?page=2 ', 
please enter 'page', 
and if it is 
'holla.net/board?pages=3&searchword=hello' , 
please enter 'pages'.)

4. Press the save button and it's over

Basic operation method
Left Direction key: Go to the previous page.
Right Direction: Go to the next page.
Up arrow keys: go to top of page
Down arrow keys: go to the bottom of the page

If you need to add features, please visit our review or github.
